song.title: I Love My Life
song.lyrics:
I love my life (I love my life)
I love my life (I love my life)
I love my life, I love my life (yeahhhh)

None a wi nuh know weh tomorrow may bring cah di future deh hours away
So mi a live my life today, mi a live my life today yeah
So low mi mek mi talk weh mi waan fi talk mi have nuff mi say
So mi a go live my life today, mi a go live my life today
So everybody help mi sing it out

Oh oh
Mi love my life
Oh oh
Mi love my life
Oh oh
Mi love my life
So mi a live my life today
Oh oh
Mi love my life
Oh oh
Mi love my life
Oh oh
Mi love my life
So mi a live my life today

Mek a change don't mek nobody stress yuh
Don't mek no blood pressure mek yuh life leff yuh
Neva yuh hurt a soul unless yuh haffi defend yuhself if dem try test yuh
Thank God fi mi life yes
Mi wake up this morning and alive yes
Mek dem gwaan judge nobody nuh perfect and Fadda god alone bring brightness
If yuh nuh like how mi seh, go find the lord
Mi nuh have nuh time fi di war cah time so hard
Dem nuh mad mi, mi nah go nuh psycho a ward
Or go join the morgue
Enjoy mi life oh yoo

Few friends weh mi have weh dear to me
Mi nuh trust people so mi choose dem carefully
Dem heart nuh clean so dem cyan come near to me
Cyan compare to me

None a wi nuh know weh tomorrow may bring cah di future deh hours away
So mi a live my life today, mi a live my life today yeah
So low mi mek mi talk weh mi waan fi talk mi have nuff mi say
So mi a go live my life today, mi a go live my life today
So everybody help mi sing it out

Oh oh
Mi love my life
Oh oh
Mi love my life
Oh oh
Mi love my life
So mi a live my life today
Oh oh
Mi love my life
Oh oh
Mi love my life
Oh oh
Mi love my life
So mi a live my life today

Cho
Neva mek nobody get di best of you
Look pon di person inna di mirror pon di dresser too
Tell yuhself seh yuh nah go mek dem pressure yuh
And live life to di fullest that yuh betta do
Just believe me, mi know life nuh easy
Nuff of wi neva born wid gold spooon fi feed wi
Nuh be greedy, set a pace inna life and achieve it
Listen to mi keenly
Mi love mi L.I.F.E.
Until it leff mi
Mi a gwaan keep happy and pray to fadda god
Seh old age catch mi
Mi a beg yuh fadda, bless mi
Guide and protect mi
Fi every wrong move weh mi mek inna di streets correct mi yeah

None a wi nuh know weh tomorrow may bring cah di future deh hours away
So mi a live my life today, mi a live my life today yeah
So low mi mek mi talk weh mi waan fi talk mi have nuff mi say
So mi a go live my life today, mi a go live my life today
So everybody help mi sing it out

Oh oh
Mi love my life
Oh oh
Mi love my life
Oh oh
Mi love my life
So mi a live my life today
Oh oh
Mi love my life
Oh oh
Mi love my life
Oh oh
Mi love my life
So mi a live my life today

example_sentences: Mi love my life.
Mi a go live my life today.
Mi wake up this morning and alive yes.
None a wi nuh know weh tomorrow may bring.
Mi nuh trust people so mi choose dem carefully.
Nuh be greedy, set a pace inna life and achieve it.
None a wi nuh know weh tomorrow may bring.
Fi every wrong move weh mi mek inna di streets correct mi.
Few friends weh mi have weh dear to me.
None a wi nuh know weh tomorrow may bring cah di future deh hours away.
Mi nuh have nuh time fi di war cah time so hard.
Cah di future deh hours away.
Mek a change don't mek nobody stress yuh.
So low mi mek mi talk weh mi waan fi talk.
Mek dem gwaan judge nobody nuh perfect.
Neva yuh hurt a soul unless yuh haffi defend yuhself if dem try test yuh.
Mek dem gwaan judge nobody nuh perfect.
Dem heart nuh clean so dem cyan come near to me.
Don't mek no blood pressure mek yuh life leff yuh.
Neva mek nobody get di best of you.
Tell yuhself seh yuh nah go mek dem pressure yuh.
Thank God fi mi life yes.
Mi nuh have nuh time fi di war.
Fi every wrong move weh mi mek inna di streets correct mi.

vocabulary.explanation: Means 'go on' or 'continue' in Jamaican Patois.
example_sentences: Mek dem gwaan judge nobody nuh perfect.
Mi a gwaan keep happy and pray to fadda god.
Mi a gwaan live my life today.
Set a pace inna life and achieve it.
Fi every wrong move weh mi mek inna di streets correct mi.
Look pon di person inna di mirror.
Don't mek no blood pressure mek yuh life leff yuh.
Mi love mi L.I.F.E. until it leff mi.
Mi a gwaan keep happy and pray to fadda god seh old age catch mi.

vocabulary.explanation: Means 'have to' or 'must' in Jamaican Patois.
example_sentences: Neva yuh hurt a soul unless yuh haffi defend yuhself.
Yuh haffi live life to di fullest.
Mi haffi go now.
Dem heart nuh clean so dem cyan come near to me.
Cyan compare to me.
Mi cyan believe it.
Live life to di fullest that yuh betta do.
Yuh betta listen to mi keenly.
Mi feel betta now.

vocabulary.explanation: Means 'enough' or 'a lot' in Jamaican Patois.
example_sentences: Mi have nuff mi say.
Nuff of wi neva born wid gold spooon fi feed wi.
Mi have nuff tings fi do.
Mi nah go nuh psycho a ward.
Tell yuhself seh yuh nah go mek dem pressure yuh.
Mi nah go do it.
Mek dem gwaan judge nobody nuh perfect and Fadda god alone bring brightness.
Mi a gwaan keep happy and pray to fadda god.
Mi a beg yuh fadda, bless mi.
Cah di future deh hours away.
Mi deh yah fi yuh.
Di book deh pon di table.

vocabulary.explanation: An expression of frustration or disbelief in Jamaican Patois.
example_sentences: Cho, mi cyan believe it.
Cho, yuh always late.
Cho, mi nuh like dat.
If yuh nuh like how mi seh, go find the lord.
Tell yuhself seh yuh nah go mek dem pressure yuh.
Mi seh mi love my life.
None a wi nuh know weh tomorrow may bring cah di future deh hours away.
Neva mek nobody get di best of you.
Look pon di person inna di mirror.
Look pon di person inna di mirror.
Mi deh pon di phone.
Di book deh pon di table.
Mi wake up this morning and alive yes.
Mi feel so alive today.
Mi a live my life and feel alive.
Don't mek no blood pressure mek yuh life leff yuh.
Tell yuhself seh yuh nah go mek dem pressure yuh.
Di pressure a get to mi.
Mek dem gwaan judge nobody nuh perfect.
Don't judge mi, yuh nuh know mi story.
Mi nuh like when people judge mi.
Mek dem gwaan judge nobody nuh perfect.
Nobody nuh perfect, mi just a try mi best.
Mi nuh perfect but mi a work pon it.
Fadda god alone bring brightness.
Di sun bring brightness to di day.
Mi love di brightness of di morning.
Look pon di person inna di mirror.
Mi see mi reflection inna di mirror.
Di mirror nuh lie.
Nuh be greedy, set a pace inna life and achieve it.
Mi nuh like greedy people.
Greedy fi more, mi always want more.
Listen to mi keenly.
Mi watch di movie keenly.
Yuh haffi listen keenly to understand.
